message: I really want to incorporate some of these UI elements into more specialized software.  I could imagine this being useful for astronomers.
Though I guess it's also general enough that there'd be nothing stopping astronomers from using it as is.
Nice presentation.  Solid use of embedding iPython
This would be a really good tool for education
I could use this to build a really nice UI for FITS visualization.
I was very impressed.  I hope you roll in some of the new IPython features.  In particular  editing multiple text.
